Articles.Content:
Hello, there is lot of fun with creating rockets, uber-mun-ships, and stuff like that, but there could be much more fun when you use your sick imagination. (I\'ll add more accurate info about ships if you want)

So at first, let me introduce you my latest monster: Kerb Fighter v3. I\'m very proud of this, it has excellent maneuver abilities, and good speed, if only i could add some missiles...

If you can\'t decide, what you can use to celebrate new year, here is Morningstar v4, I\'d like to show vid. how it looks like in the air (it explodes like a firework), but I only have photo:

I really loved results of Morningstar series, so I worked on new version. That is, how 'Star of Bethlehem' was created (of course, by accident):

By accident as well, I created something, what could be used in those new Space-Nazi movies, looks kinda creepy:
